alert.note: Alert for Fremont; Mills; Montgomery; Page (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 4:54PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Fremont, southwestern Montgomery, southeastern Mills and northwestern Page Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 453 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sidney, or 12 miles east of Nebraska City, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree branches and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Farragut around 505 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Randolph. This includes Interstate 29 near mile marker 7. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
